## ITransferable.isTransferRestricted() method

Returns true if transfers are restricted. Otherwise returns false.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isTransferRestricted(): Promise<boolean>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

- True if transfers are restricted.
